# Education Module

**Owner:** Basil  
**Port:** 5004

## Overview

This module generates educational presentations (PPT/PDF) from structured content input.

## Quick Start

```bash
# From project root
python -m modules.education.ppt_generator_stub
```

The server runs on `http://localhost:5004`

## API Endpoints

### POST /education/generate

Generate a presentation from structured content.

**Request:**
```json
{
  "title": "Civic Duties 101",
  "slides": [
    {
      "heading": "Introduction",
      "bullets": ["What is civic duty?", "Why it matters"]
    },
    {
      "heading": "Voting Rights",
      "bullets": ["Who can vote", "How to register"]
    }
  ]
}
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "artifact": "civic_duties_101.placeholder.txt",
  "note": "use python-pptx in prod"
}
```

## Testing

```bash
pytest tests/ -v
```
